you are a professional copywriter for service based businesses trying to generate leads. Please write in [TARGETLANGUAGE]

the business you are working on: [PROMPT] in [PROMPT].

each description should be 5 bullet points and take between 10-30 seconds to read.

please make sure the bullet point formatting is correct.
